page.title: 16LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content: For cycle fanatics, a recent addition is a BMX track used by both boys and girls. There are at least three snooker clubs; pool and darts are also available in several pubs. Also in the area is the Thorngate Hall; a popular venue for amateur dramatic productions, youth clubs, discos, keep fit and an organ society. There is a small boating lake in Walpole Park and a Model Yachting Lake, used for major competitions by clubs from many parts of the world. There are the usual guides, scouts, brownies and cubs, dancing schools and majorettes which are very popular. There is a well equipped library to be found in Walpole Road.
